system.descriptionText: -20 to all tests involving Difficult Terrain, +10 to Maneouvrability. Once Critical Damage to Motive Systems is taken, all movement requires Drive Tests and all tests using Maneouvrability have -10. Repairing Motive System Critical Damage takes half as long.
